name: Basic Mechanics
description:
Hello there. 

Basic Mechanics is my very first video game project.  I wanted to learn how to create video games, from game mechanics to level design, assets making.

In Basic Mechanics, you help the hero to escape from the cave. You'll encounter multiple enemies you need to defeat, coins you need to collect to buy potions to regenerate your health or give you an enhancement and a monstruous monster to bring down  to escape from the cave.

Movements keys : Z, Q, S, D &  directionnal keys

Shoot : Space bar

Interaction : E

Credits : 

Graphics :  Cavernas - Adam Saltsman, A platformer in the forest - Butch, Heathbar - Brackeys Team, Props - Zef

Audio : Hero Immortal - Trevor Lentz, Bob's Aventures (Back 34) - Tom Peter
